      • ToggleButton

        public ToggleButton(processing.core.PApplet p,
                    float x,
                    float y)
        Makes a ToggleButton object that is toggled on and off, i.e. like a switch.
        Parameters:
        p - the instance of PApplet, usually "this"
        x - float
        y - float

      • ToggleButton

        public ToggleButton(processing.core.PApplet p,
                    float x,
                    float y,
                    java.lang.String l)
        The other ToggleButton constructor.
        Parameters:
        p - the instance of PApplet (the Processing sketch), usually "this"
        x - float
        y - float
        l - String, the button's descriptive name, i.e. "Display Bunnies."
